channel.title: My server - error connecting to server
channel.description:
Compiler errors: none
Problem: No one can connect to my server. It is port-fowarded correctly. I used Canyouseeme(dot)org to check this. It can see my port open. It's not only my client because I used rs-ps(dot)org to make a webclient and it still doesnt connect. Any help is appreciated...Thanks... and i cant even connect to my server "error connecting to server"

item.title: My server - error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Sinthavong:

what do you mean my “own” client?

the client you coded the server with. to test it if its an active connection, try it with 127.0.0.1 (both server and client) (duh) :P. then change BOTH the server and your client to Your no-ip IP. if it logs you in, its all good. sometimes the rs-ps.org glitches up…

Read full topic
item.source: My server - error connecting to server

item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

use your own client to see if its working. i HATE the site rs-ps.org…post back if you still have the same issue once you are useing your own client.
